column5: WillieB,thought I'd hop off of Rick's post on Bisco. thanks for the input on whitewater. seems like it should hold some big pike with the size of the water and the greasy bait fish and lakers. we would have preferred one of the outposts but really wanted a crack at some trophy norhterns and thought this would be best.as long as we catch some fish we will be happy but if we can catch and release a few big daddys it will be a great trip.our only concern is how many others will be there. there are a few camps on the lake, my understanding is one of them is almost 20 miles away.lobo
